PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Software Engineer

March 2015 - Present Samsung Electronics, Seoul, South Korea

Worked in a collaborative development environment to design and implement B2B sub-systems. The systems were applied to various products all over the world.

Designed Full Disk Encryption for Tizen which was deployed using the dmcrypt of Linux features. The solution provided LUKS compatibility, a Fast Encryption algorithm, and reduced encryption and decryption time 90%.

Designed, developed, and implemented an on-demand daemon as content provider among containers of Tizen. The project required cross-functional collaboration with Kaspersky Labs of Russia.

Coordinated project activities across multiple departments such as QA, Development, Customer Support, and Documentation, and across multiple geographical locations.

Developed a wide range of functional enhancements and performance improvements to dozens of existing modules.

Junior Software Engineer

December 2010 - Febrary 2015 Samsung Electronics, Suwon, South Korea

Experienced various debugging environments such as Windows, Linux, Embedded System, Mac, and RTOS.

Learned and applied fundamental knowledge about Linux Kernel, Assembly, Compiler, Cryptographic and Android (build system and frameworks).

Implemented the Android App integrity verification and In-Memory Data Transform for Secure Cryptographic Engine to the Samsung Software Protection Framework which has protected over 60 types of Samsung products worldwide

Implemented the function and constant encryption, and designed automatic caller/callee verification algorithm which resulted in the reduction of user preparation by 20%, and increased obfuscated area 80% more than binary-level obfuscation.
